title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

title: Test Article for Enabled Features
content:
This is a test article to verify the functionality of several enabled features in the Redefine theme.
Table of Contents TestThis heading should appear in the Table of Contents.
Sub-headingThis is a sub-heading, which should also be in the TOC.
Word Count and Reading TimeThis article contains some text to test the word count and estimated reading time feature. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed non risus. Suspendisse lectus tortor, dignissim sit amet, adipiscing nec, ultricies sed, dolor. Cras elementum ultrices diam. Maecenas ligula massa, varius a, semper congue, euismod non, mi.
Link IconHere is a link to Google that should have an icon next to it.
Code BlockHere is a code block with a copy button.
function greet() {  console.log("Hello, World!");}

Image LazyloadThis image should be lazy-loaded.


Copyright NoticeA copyright notice should be displayed at the end of this article.
MathJax TestThis section tests the MathJax rendering.

Block math:
